mapper.select: SELECT c.CaseId FROM case_mediations c LEFT JOIN case_file_relations r on c.CaseId = r.CaseId and c.id =r.RelatedId LEFT JOIN files f on r.fileId = f.id WHERE c.CaseId =#{CaseId} AND c.PlatformId ='001'AND c.DeleteFlag = 0 AND r.PlatformId='001'AND r.RelationType =5 AND r.DeleteFlag = 0 AND r.PlatformId='001'
